item.description:
Come join Sierra Club local outings for an all-ages hike and trail clean 
up at Middlesex Fells reservation. 

Time: 9am at park and finished around 1pm

Pre-meeting meetup: 8:15am-  Panera Bread- 201 Brookline Avenue, ( if there is interest in carpooling, which should be arranged on an individual to individual basis- meaning Sierra club is not responsible for carpooling arrangements)


Contact Joe Walz at 508-726-2427 (work cell) for more information.

About the Middlesex Fells Park Reservation

http://www.fells.org/visit/

About DCR Park Serve Day

http://parkserv.env.state.ma.us/home.aspx
item.how_to_find_us: Will have a Sierra Club name tag on
item.why: We care about our parks and want to be caretaker of our natural gifts that we have in our parks/reservations.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Middlesex Fells Hike/Park Cleanup
